segments.text: Excuse me , driver , where is the main area for restaurants ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's near the Wall Street , a bit far from there . Why not get on the car
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Is there a Chinese restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . More than that , you have Italy pizza , English steak , kimchi and local specialties .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Woo , I can't help being there .
segments.speaker: S1
